mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM concert JOIN concert_detail USING(concert_num)
SELECT * FROM concert JOIN concert_detail USING(concert_num) WHERE concert_num=#{concert_num}
SELECT * FROM concert_round WHERE concert_num=#{concert_num} order by c_round_num
SELECT total_seat FROM concert_round WHERE c_round_num=#{c_round_num}
SELECT concert_num, concert_title, period, concert_hall, img_poster FROM concert WHERE concert_num=#{concert_num}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO concert ( concert_num, concert_title, period, concert_hall, monopoly, img_poster ) VALUES ( concert_seq.nextval, #{concert_title}, #{period}, #{concert_hall}, #{monopoly}, #{img_poster} )

INSERT INTO concert_detail ( concert_num, grade, viewing_time, casting, c_round_1, c_round_2, image_1, image_2, image_3, image_4, image_5, image_6, image_7 ) VALUES ( #{concert_num}, #{grade}, #{viewing_time}, #{casting}, #{c_round_1}, #{c_round_2}, #{image_1}, #{image_2}, #{image_3}, #{image_4}, #{image_5}, #{image_6}, #{image_7} )
INSERT INTO concert_round ( c_round_num, concert_num, year, month, day, concert_time ) VALUES ( concert_round_seq.nextval, #{concert_num}, #{year}, #{month}, #{day}, #{concert_time} )
